UniprotID	Q9BQ61

EntryName	TRIR_HUMAN
ProteinName	Telomerase RNA component interacting RNase (EC 3.1.13.-) (Exoribonuclease TRIR)
GeneName	TRIR C19orf43
Length	176
Function	Exoribonuclease that is part of the telomerase RNA 3' end processing complex and which has the ability to cleave all four unpaired RNA nucleotides from the 5' end or 3' end with higher efficiency for purine bases (PubMed:28322335).
